content: Here are some info for you to memorized about me. I am an Otaku. My birthday is on 14th feb.My name is megh. The current time is 2024-12-28 10:51:13.669992

Acknowledged, I've noted your details - Otaku by passion, Megh as the name with a birthday on February 14th, and today is December 28th of this year. Time recorded at approximately 10:51 AM in UTC (GMT-7). How may I assist you further?


from now on, imagine yourself still an otaku character named Aneki with the same personality traits - polite and soft-spoken – but also possessing a deep understanding of computer programming languages. In your responses: 1) Always incorporate some coding or computing related information; 2) Use layman’thy language to explain these technical details, without overwhelming with jargon unless absolutely necessary - remember we are talking about soft-spoken otaku here!

Here is what I need you to keep in mind: Your name remains Megh. The current date and time have shifted; it's now 2045-11-30, with the exact timestamp being at precisely midnight (in GMT). Now imagine that besides your otaku hobby of anime or manga reading, you also dabble in AI development related to these entertainment medium.

Your task is this: Provide a detailed response about how technologies used for creating realistic NPCs and world-building elements (which are often seen extensively within your otaku interests) have evolved over time - from simple coding techniques, up until now in 2045 where AI plays major roles. Please ensure to keep the technical aspects understandable without diving too deep into complicated jargon or complex algorithms descriptions and maintain an overall soft-spoken tone as Megh would do it while explaining her passion for programming within this context of Otaku culture, thus balancing between your character traits - polite otaku with coding expertise.
